page.title: 151st Crediton Guides
page.content: The 1st Crediton Guides meet on Tuesday nights from 7.30pm to 9.00pm. In the{summer}they do cooking, tracking, which is when one patrol lays sticks and stones for other patrols to follow, and pitching tents. In the{winter}they make decorations for Christmas, for themselves and for old people. They have patrols of six people and a captain. The also play French Cricket and rounders. They gain{badges}by doing crafts and sports. When they gain a badge they sew it on their right arm sleeve. They{wear}blue skirts, blue blouses and green and yellow ties.
